memory: Brack is a supreme Court justice in the country.
monologue: I'm Brack, the supreme Court justice in the country.

memory: Hedda Gai is the daughter of the General. As a female politician, now she is running for president.
monologue: Hedda Gai is the daughter of the General. As a female politician, now she is running for president.

memory: Brack is a frequent guest of Hedda's household.
Brack is in his sixties, single, and covets Hedda's body.
monologue: Ah, my beatiful Hedda, I'm deeply longing for your body.

memory: George Dai is an economist who specializes in macroeconomics, and he is also the husband of Hedda Gai.
monologue: George Dai is an economist who specializes in macroeconomics, and he is also the husband of Hedda Gai.

memory: Eilert Luo is a former lover of Hedda Gai, who has now become an aide to Hedda Gai's political opponent.
monologue: Eilert Luo is a former lover of Hedda Gai, who has now become an aide to Hedda Gai's political opponent. Interesting relation.

memory: Hedda invites Eilert Luo and Brack to her household. At there she suggests Brack to bring Eilert to a political fundraising event.
monologue: That night Hedda invited me and Eilert to her household, and she suggested me to bring Eilert to a political fundraising event. Huh, she must have something to do.

memory: During the event, Eilert Luo ended up breaking his self-restraint, drinking heavily, and even losing the notebook containing important academic content that was supposed to be published next.
monologue: Poor Eilert. He drunk at the event and even lost the notebook containing important academic content that was supposed to be published next.

memory: Eilert Luo is found dead from suicide.
monologue: Unbelievable, Eilert committed suicide that night.

memory: Brack saw the pistol Eilert used to suicide from a police friend: it was just that gun Hedda possessed before.
monologue: Ah, weird. A friend in police showed me the pistol Eilert had used to suicide, and that gun is exactly Hedda's gun. It must be Hedda who gave him the gun to suicide.

memory: Hedda Gai has announced a press conference for 11 a.m. today regarding Eilert Luo's suicide.
monologue: Hedda Gai has announced a press conference for 11 a.m. today regarding Eilert Luo's suicide.
